main event: On November 17, 1964, witnesses observed two spinning lights in the sky over Bridgewater, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The lights appeared to have no definite shape and approached slowly, seemingly hovering before passing overhead,The objects were described as emitting noise similar to a jet or helicopter,The sighting lasted for 1.5 minutes and involved a total of three witnesses,The objects were about 40 ft high and 170 yds away when first observed,The witnesses were confident that the objects were not conventional aircraft.
